alert.note: Alert for Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 24 at 9:03AM CDT until October 24 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Oklahoma County in central Oklahoma... * Until 930 AM CDT. * At 903 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over southeastern Oklahoma City, or near Smith Village, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oklahoma City, Midwest City, Del City, Choctaw, Spencer, Jones, Nicoma Park, Tinker Air Force Base, Forest Park, Lake Aluma and Smith Village. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
